message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You could have taken 50/50, now I'm taking 60/40. Your loss!
You took a risk by going 60/40, now I'll try to get closer to 50/50
You're getting desperate, I'm taking 70/30. Don't say I didn't warn you!
You're pushing your luck, but I'll give you a slightly better deal
